name: Crashword
description:
Crashword is a co-operative party word game that's fun for all ages!

Each turn, one single player is the guesser trying to guess a secret word; everyone else is a clue-giver. Each clue-giver submits a one word clue, trying to help the guesser guess the secret word. All duplicate clues (crashes) are thrown out, and the guesser only sees the clues that were unique.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Miku Full Week
description: Friday Night Funkin': Miku Full Week is a mod that adds in a full week based around the Vocaloid character Hatsune Miku.

name: I Make Saints
description:
I Make Saints is a short first-person psychological horror walking simulator which can be completed in 30 minutes.

Wander the personal hell of a deranged individual and discover the true nature of their terrible crimes through notes, objects and saintly icons left over different atmospheric and at times surreal environments.

name: Fushigi no Gensoukyou
description: Fushigi no Gensoukyou is a roguelike game by Aqua Style based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Friday Night Funkin' Soft
description:
Friday Night Funkin’ Soft does not stay within canon by any means. It’s a remix of the base story and even though the characters are counterparts/based off of the ones you are familiar with, should not be expected to stick with said canon.

Friday Night Funkin’ Soft takes the basic reskin formula and turns it on it’s head. Its a new way to enjoy a beloved rhythm game with a focus on story telling, character design, and creativity.

name: Sanae no Chou Tokkyuu: TheExpressTrial
description: A doujin game by Aqua Style based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Secret Cat Forest
description:
Nowadays playing games can often be stressful than relaxing…

So why not play this whenever you feel like relaxing and befriending cats?
Craft items/furniture the kitties love!
Craft them one by one, and the most adorable kitties will appear… maybe…

name: I'm on Cirno Duty
description:
This is a fangame based on the I'm On Observation Duty Series by Notovia/Zaster, created with their permission, made for and themed after Twitch streamer Cirno_TV. Please support the original I'm On Observation Duty series on Steam, iOS and Android.

Like in the original games, you have to check live surveillance footage to detect and report anomalies by type and location, which can be anything from a room's door opening, to the sudden presence of strange intruders.

The difference in this game is that a lot of the anomalies are either generic memes or Cirno_TV community-related jokes/references. Originally a private project, the game became public after a significant amount of interest was shown from audiences.

name: Game & Watch Donkey Kong Jr.
description: A recreation of the Donkey Kong Jr. Game & Watch handheld.

name: Game & Watch Mario's Cement Factory
description: A recreation of the homonymous Game & Watch handheld.

name: Super Mario Bros.
description: A special edition of Game & Watch Super Mario Bros. It was a prize for the Famicon's F-1 Grand Prix tournament on August 1, 1987 with the code YM-901-S. It is a single-screen single-player game with a yellow case. It came in a plastic box modeled after Disk-kun, the Famicom Disk System mascot. This edition is the rarest of all Game & Watch models, with only 10,000 units produced and never available at retail.

name: Motto!? Fushigi no Gensoukyou: Under the Moonlight
description: Motto!? Fushigi no Gensoukyou: Under the Moonlight is a Mystery Dungeon game made by Aqua Style. It is a sequel to Fushigi no Gensokyo, featuring Reimu Hakurei as its main character with newly adopted enemies, items, equipment, systems, and many more.

name: Miracle Party: Fushigi no Gensoukyou 2
description: Miracle Party -Mystery Gensokyo 2- is a roguelike game starring Sanae as the main character, created by AQUA STYLE. It is the fourth title of the Fushigi no Gensokyo series and has many new features such as a complete new user-interface, a new party system.

description: More!? Mystery Gensokyo plus -The Dungeon of Dreams and Magic is a roguelike game created by Aqua Style. It is an expansion disk of the previous work Motto!? Fushigi no Gensokyo Under the Moonlight.

name: Hop for the Best
description:
Hop For The Best is an indie clay-style platformer game in which you play as Forgy, an adorable little frog chasing hope for a better life.

Sprint, roll, climb, dash, and hop through beautiful clay inspired worlds. With no way to attack and danger at every turn, all you can do is… Hop For The Best!

Hop For The Best Features four gameplay modes. Standard Mode, One-Life Mode, Kid’s Mode, and Challenge Mode.

name: Fushigi no Gensoukyou 3
description: Fushigi no Gensoukyou 3 is a roguelike game by Aqua Style based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Miracle Party Plus: Fushigi no Gensoukyou 2
description: A doujin game by Aqua Style based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Justice Fighting Force
description:
In a world filled with superheroes and villains, you’re just an average high schooler. You’ve never seen a hero or villain in person, but that all changes when you cross paths with an oddly dressed girl…

Suddenly, you find yourself ripped away from your normal life and at the mercy of three beautiful villains bent on taking over the city. Can you come to understand why they do the things they do, or will you remain an ignorant puppet in their schemes?

name: I Made A Contract with 3 Cute Devils?!
description:
Never make a deal with a devil! That's a lesson you learn the hard way when you accidentally summon three sexy girls and jokingly wish for them to live with you, thinking it's all just a dream. Contract accepted!

Waking up in your bed with three gorgeous devils is a pleasant surprise, but when you realize your parents were the price, reality sets in. Now, your only hope is to work alongside these girls to save your family—but what happens when your emotions move beyond the contract? Are you willing to take chances with just one, or will you pick all three?!

Sign on the dotted line and get ready for a hell-raising fun time with three sexy devil girls!

name: Spellbound Schoolgirls!
description:
It’s your first day at school and you’re one of the first male students at a former girls-only school! You’re a little nervous at first, but you’ve got supportive classmates to help you out. However, you soon realize that this isn’t just any school… It’s a school for wizards! And unfortunately, you’ve got no magical powers!

Luckily, you befriend a couple of very cute little witches that help you fake your magic abilities. You soon find yourself enjoying a (somewhat unique) high school life! However, it seems like there’s a reason that you were invited to this school. It seems that you may have some kind of ability that no wizard has…

Will you unlock the secrets of the school? Will you find your magical sweetheart? Find out in Spellbound Schoolgirls!

name: Supernatural Sweethearts
description:
Life wasn’t super exciting in high school, but things weren’t all that bad. Especially with a cute childhood friend to hang out with. But one day after soccer practice, you found a strange piece of paper with ancient writing on a wall. You got a strange feeling coming from it and decided to pull it off the wall. If only you knew that was the only thing holding back evil spirits from taking over your school!

With monsters free to escape now, things are looking a whole lot more dangerous! Luckily, you don’t have to fight alone… Two girls that are part of an ancient clan of supernatural Oni are here to help you fight!

Will you be able to fight off the monsters and save the school? Will you be able to protect your friend? Can humans and Oni fall in love? Find out in Supernatural Sweethearts!

name: Public Defense Corp: The Ambassador of Peace
description: Haruka finally catches a break after Jakou’s attack on Japan relents. At the same time, without any enemies to fight, her life as an FUW pilot has become a bit boring. Luckily, her staff has a great idea: become a tourism ambassador to help the economy recover!

name: Rock Band 3
description: Rock Band 3 adds 83 new songs to the Rock Band library and for the first time supports a keyboard/keytar peripheral.

name: Spektakl: Banned Edition
description:
\SPEK.TAKL\ is a a first-person psychological horror game with multiple endings that can be completed in under an hour.

It is a late-night television watching simulator. Sit down on the couch in your new apartment straight out of 1994 and enjoy a cozy evening bingeing cable TV until the sign-off comes around and there's nothing else to watch.

Whatever you do, do not worry about the neighbors; do NOT answer the door; and never EVER watch the VHS tapes that are dropped through your mail slot.

\SPEK.TAKL\ is an intense, intimate and disturbing horror-themed psychosexual exploration on the lengths some of us go to in order to avoid facing the inevitable.

name: Threshold RPG
description:
Threshold is a high fantasy, real-time, multi-player, online role playing game. Once you step across the Threshold you will be absorbed by the rich, detailed, highly developed role playing atmosphere that comprises this fantasy realm. You become the hero, the heroine, or even the villain depending on your character and your imagination.

On Threshold, role playing is required and enforced. This policy creates and preserves Threshold's top notch role playing environment. Although there are places to communicate "out of character" within the game (after all, it is nice to get to know the people you are gaming with), outside of such areas players stay completely in character.

Threshold RPG opened to the public in June of 1996. It is the oldest role playing enforced MUD currently in operation.

Available 24 hours a day, 365 days a year, this exciting gaming environment is home to thousands of players from all over the world. These players are indeed what makes Threshold RPG a truly unique and marvellous gaming community.

name: Combat 3D
description: Combat 3D is a multiplayer tank battle game. Players control tanks in various 3D environments, engaging in combat against other players or AI-controlled opponents. The game features different tank models, each with unique characteristics and capabilities. Players navigate their tanks through diverse terrains, using strategy and skill to outmaneuver and defeat enemies. Combat 3D likely includes multiple game modes, such as team deathmatch, capture the flag, or objective-based missions. The game emphasizes tactical gameplay, requiring players to consider factors like armor positioning, ammunition types, and terrain advantages. With its 3D graphics, Combat 3D aims to provide an immersive tank warfare experience, appealing to fans of military vehicle combat games and strategy enthusiasts seeking competitive multiplayer action.

description: The Land Before Time: Dinosaur Arcade is an educational game for Windows-based PCs intended for children ages 4-7 released by Sound Source Interactive in North America in November 2000. The game features five minigames revolving around Littlefoot, Spike, Petrie, Ducky, and Chomper that involve guiding them around various levels and a pinball-style game. Children's Software Review noted that it was less educational than others in its genre, calling it a "strictly an entertainment title", with little real educational value except for some practice with eye-hand coordination and logic.

name: Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration
description:
Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration takes players on an interactive journey through 50 years of video games via interviews with designers, developers and industry leaders, documentary footage, product design documents, high-resolution original artwork, and a specially-curated list of more than 90 playable games.

At the heart of Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration are the Interactive Timelines, which combine historical trivia, digital artifacts, all-new video interviews, and playable games into one singular experience. When you encounter a game in the Timeline, you can immediately play it without losing your place.

The massive list of games spans six original Atari console and home computer platforms and generations of arcade titles, the most ever included in a collection by the team at Digital Eclipse. For the first time ever, games from the cult favorite Atari Jaguar and Atari Lynx platforms will be playable on modern consoles. Behind every game are the stories of Atari, what was happening at the company, what went into the creation of the games and the hardware on which they ran, all told by the people who were there. It is a rare opportunity to get a rich behind-the-scenes look at the history of video games.

In addition to presenting these Atari classics exactly as they were, the talented team at Digital Eclipse has also created the Reimagined series—six new games that revisit, mash-up and reimagine Atari Classics. Each of these new games is included in Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration.

name: Final Fantasy VII
description: The PC version of Final Fantasy VII is based on an unfinished build of the Japanese version, and therefore contains the same bugs. It featured a midi soundtrack and the FMV were in lower resolutions. This PC version would end up providing the source code for subsequent ports.

name: Svetlograd
description: Evil imps are invading the cities of Svetlograd. As a counter-measure, a crossbow is deployed to protect the gates, using the imps themselves as ammunition.

name: Sweetopia
description: Marble-popping fans get a taste of "la dolce vida" with Sweetopia from casual games publisher PlayFirst. The frantic action takes place in a candy factory filled with twisting conveyor belts transporting a mix of 14 confection types. The goal is to eliminate groups of three or more by launching specific candies toward matching treats. Twists on the familiar theme include ricocheting candy off barriers and firing the sweets from a choice of launchers within each stage. Two play modes (Arcade and Story) offer slightly different objectives as you attempt to clear 70 luscious levels and save the fructose-filled factory from closing down.

The consoles versions of Final Fantasy VII are based on the PC re-release, some little graphical improvements were made.

Keep your brain young with daily puzzles that never get old. Carefully crafted, high-quality puzzles delivered to you every day, each Sudoku puzzle offers a brand new challenge to wrap your head around. Earn a streak and watch the days pile up. Can you earn a year-long streak?

The Collector's Edition includes:
- Investigate a ghostly theft in the Bonus Chapter
- Replay your favorite HOPs and mini-games, earn achievements, and unlock the Secret Room
- Collect jigsaw pieces and journal pages to reveal even more content
- Enjoy exclusive wallpapers and music
- Never get lost with the strategy guide

name: Strange Investigations: Two for Solitaire - Collector's Edition
description:
An investigation into a fellow detective’s death uncovers details of his last case – and now Dana may be the next target!

The Collector's Edition includes:
- Find a hidden inheritance in the bonus game
- Replay your favorite HOPs and mini-games to earn achievements
- Complete jigsaw puzzles and unlock a secret room
- Enjoy exclusive wallpapers and music
- Unravel the mystery with the help of an official strategy guide

name: Yakuza Undisputed
description: This story follows Goku a yakuza member who spent 12 years in prison for a crime he did not commit. After being released, he learns that the Tojo clan had taken his beloved"xioyu" captive for wrongfully been accused of spending the Tojo boss money and now he has to rescue her from the opposing gang.

name: PomoFarm
description: PomoFarm is half focus timer and half idle farming game! As Tomato the Duck, grow your farm as you focus on tasks in the real world!

name: K-Pop & Rock Band Manager
description: A new star is born! Favour Toys B.V. Entertainment wants to release a new 4-member Band. You have to choose the trainees who you think are ready to make their debut to the public and make a new history. How you manage the band will determine their future.

name: Way of the Hunter: Elite Edition
description:
The Elite Edition includes the base game as well as the following extras items:
- Way of the Hunter: Season Pass.
The Way of the Hunter Season Pass includes two new region DLCs. + The Way of the Hunter Hunter's Pack

name: Doctor Who: The Edge of Reality + The Lonely Assassins
description:
Doctor Who: The Edge of Reality
Experience an unforgettable adventure through space and time, face terrifying monsters and solve a mind-bending mystery!

Doctor Who: The Lonely Assassins
Amidst a sinister series of events at a seemingly abandoned house in London, someone goes missing, and you find their phone. When it begins to self-destruct, ex-UNIT scientist Petronella Osgood enlists your help to uncover hidden clues and solve cryptic puzzles.

name: Ghostrunner: Complete Edition
description: Adapt, overcome and kill in the challenging but rewarding Ghostrunner: Complete Edition, the ultimate Ghostrunner experience, which includes the critically acclaimed Ghostrunner, Project _Hel expansion and all cosmetic packs.

name: Disgaea 6 Complete: Digital Dood Edition
description: Can a mere Netherworld zombie rise up and destroy a god? Find out in the most recent installment of the Disgaea series! Disgaea 6 Complete includes all previously released DLC, plus the Digital Dood Edition comes with a bonus artbook!

name: The Jackbox Party Starter
description: Get the party started with The Jackbox Party Starter! Featuring three updated titles: Quiplash 3, Trivia Murder Party 2 and Tee K.O., this starter pack is sure to entertain!

name: De Blob 2
description: de Blob 2 is a platformer/puzzle game. Despite it having the same name as the Wii, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 versions, it has a completely different story and landmarks. It is set just after de Blob but before the home consoles version of de Blob 2.

name: Crusader: No Remorse
description:
As a Silencer, one of the elite enforcers of the World Economic Consortium, you're supposed to be incorruptible. But if the system you serve is utterly corrupt, where does that leave you? You go over to the Resistance, the same pack you used to hunt down. Now your former employers better watch their backs because you're
coming after them with all the firepower at your command.

No pity. No mercy. No Remorse

name: Black Spire
description: "Black Spire" is a side-scrolling action-adventure game. You will control a brave warrior, experience difficult soul-like battles, and explore the secrets hidden in the depths of the Black Spire.

name: Monster Girl
description: As a casual puzzle game (spot the difference), it is perfect for training your observation. In the game, there are numerous hidden spots on the character's accessories and background. You need to spot 4 to 8 differences in each stage to complete the mission.

name: Tophat Quest
description: Tophat Quest! A Pixel Platformer where you play as a purple man with a Tophat going on a quest to save the world! (And meet some new friends along the way)

name: Elemgate
description: Roll through 2.5-D stages while controlling your speed and switching elements to hit gates, activate ramps, enter portals or reverse and restore gravity with the correct element to get more time that converts into score that you will need to pass levels, earn stars and find a way to escape.

name: The Jumping Sandwich
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Thunder Ceptor
description: "Thunder Ceptor" is a shooter released by Namco in 1986. Your mission is to safely return to the Federation Base through the energy corridors that connect star systems.

name: Rainbow Advanced
description: Rainbow is a colorful game for children which helps them learn the names of colors. There are two game modes: Advance mode and Normal mode. In Advance mode, the name of the color is shown in the random color which the players need to guess, so the kids can learn it easily and fast. Normal mode, however, has the names colored in black, so it is harder for players to guess. Game also includes Color Blind modes.

name: Seduction: A Monk's Fate
description: Survive in a dark realm in hopes of saving a young woman’s soul from being used in a forbidden ritual!

name: The Jumping Sandwich: Turbo
description: Sin descripción

name: Stone-Jong
description: Sin descripción

name: S.T.O.R.M.
description: Sin descripción

name: Stradiwackius: The Counting Concert
description: Sin descripción

name: The Great Reading Adventure
description: Anthropomorphic kid bear Lil' Howie and his friends help the player learn reading comprehension, alphabetizing, word families and real phonics through mini-games.

name: Goat Simulator: Nightmare Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Explorers: Red Planet
description: You're the lonesome astronaut with your jetpack-set. You will experience planet exploration with 7 different jetpacks on an abandoned planet.

name: Deformers
description: Sin descripción

name: D!Zone
description:
D!ZONE is a collection of user created WADs and utilities collected from the internet for Doom, Doom II: Hell On Earth, and other related games. These discs were popular in the early to mid 1990s when household Internet access was slower and not as common as today.

It was released by WizardWorks, Inc.

name: Super Aneurysm
description: Sin descripción

name: The Art of Fly Fishing: Volume One - Rivers of the British Isles
description: Sin descripción

name: The Clue Club: Animal Detectives
description: Sin descripción

name: The Count of Monte Cristo
description: Sin descripción

name: Where's Oswald?
description: A short horror experience taking place in a dream or a memory.

name: Minion Raid: Epic Monsters
description:
Experience epic minion adventures as a trainer in the dungeon

You have the power over many little minions - train them to become unbeatable fighting machines and take the scepter in your hands! The monsters of the underworld are looking for a new overlord, but the selection in the dungeon is hard...

To leave the arena victorious, you need well-trained minions with special abilities. They also acquire them through evolution. Your trainer skills also play a role: the better you are as a drill instructor, the more dangerous your troops will be in battle.

Attack is the best defense: Choose a suitable battle strategy!

Depending on the training session and the type of minions, they have different fighting abilities. Some are stronger in attack, some are better in defense. Accordingly, you need a clever battle strategy. Choose the attacking minions for the front lines and the minions with a longer range for the back lines. It's also helpful if you know the strengths and weaknesses of your opponents in the dungeon and choose your battle lineup accordingly.

Before facing the competition in epic battles, you can try out your minion squad in test campaigns.

But if your lineup is suitable, you can also send your minions directly into the arena for the first PvE battle. Let's see how good your training was... There are also tournaments in this idle fighting game - those are fought in PvP mode.

Winning the arena will bring you not only higher prestige, but also gold and a better ranking in the league. If you still don't get enough of battling in the dungeon, then create a guild and work together with other guild members to make fat loot.

Fame, glory and gold make you an overlord

Your mission in this idle fighting game is to seize the power in the dungeon. You'll achieve this by preparing your minions well for battle. As a trainer, you should also advance your own skills. To do this, you'll use the gold you collect through victories in the arena. Idle missions in the tavern also bring you gold. You can use it to upgrade your trainer skills and those of your minions. Afterwards, you fight your way across the dungeon on a map and encounter different enemies. Use your captured resources wisely while training your minions and you'll soon be able to rule over the monsters of the underworld.

name: Stranger of Paradise: Final Fantasy Origin - Trials of the Dragon King
description: “Trials of the Dragon King” includes new jobs, weapons, accessories, and a new category of equipment, as well as new areas, stories, and challenges.

name: Portable Island: Te no Hira no Resort
description: Portable Island: Tenohira Resort is a Japanese Adventure/Simulation where the player spends time on a pretty resort island. The game is all about enjoying the leisurely atmosphere of a vacation. You can explore in natural settings like the jungle, volcano and desert, collect insects or seashells, or experience island life.

name: Tryp FPV
description: TRYP FPV is a drone FPV Simulator. This game has been created to give the most realistic and complete drone FPV piloting experience to everyone : beginners to pro.

name: Against the Will of a Chainsaw
description: "Crime of dissociation, the dark sad fog of the future."

name: To Become a Tengu
description: An office romance otome game with a dash of supernatural.

name: Escape: The Endless Dogwatch
description: A point and click adventure game with a horror twist! You play as 2nd Officer Walton on the SS Carolina. Explore the ship, use items, find the crew, and try to survive! A fun, challenging and satisfying experience!

name: Mmmmmm
description: An homage by Stephen Lavelle to the gravity-manipulating platformer VVVVVV.

name: Promises
description: A dungeon crawler by Stephen Lavelle.

name: Puppy Shelter
description: A puzzle game about watching puppies by Stephen Lavelle.

name: Kettle
description: A game about police trapping crowds of protesters.

name: Whale of Noise
description: The autobiography of a whale who wants to learn how to sing.

name: Beatification
description: A painting game by Stephen Lavelle.

name: Metagame
description: A proposed idea for a game by MysteryMachineX.

name: Mythic Meetup
description: An unsuspecting human in search of a little more spice to their life, you have just followed a mysterious email link to ... a server of real life mythical creatures? Well, this wasn't quite the dating pool you had in mind, but some of them have definitely got their eye on you!

name: Rhythm Plus
description: Rhythm plus is a web-based vertical scrolling rhythm game (VSRG), you can make, play, and share any songs from and with anyone!

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer Reloaded: Tojiko Soga
description: Adds the player character Tojiko Soga to Touhou Genso Wanderer Reloaded.

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer: Lotus Labyrinth R - Wily Beast and Weakest Creature Friends
description: This DLC adds new team members from Touhou: Wily Beast and Weakest Creature.

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer: Lotus Labyrinth R - Lotus Friends
description:
Venture into dungeons with a huge party of your favorite Touhou characters!
This is a dungeon-crawler RPG with an absurdly large party size!
The dungeon-crawler RPG Genso Wanderer is now a game with an Oversized Party System that pushes the envelope of the roguelike genre!
Now you can bring dozens of partners with you on your dungeon crawls, in addition to other quality of life improvements that make the game's systems and controls smoother than ever.

name: Danmaku Amanojaku Gold Rush
description: Danmaku Amanojaku Gold Rush is a one-stage danmaku mini game and publicly-unreleased installment of the Touhou Project, featuring Seija Kijin as the sole playable character and Reimu Hakurei as the sole stage boss. The game was created for Digital Game Expo 2014's "Doujin Shooting Game Caravan" contest, where it was available to be played.

name: Fallen London: Dernier Cri
description: "Dernier Cri" is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. "Dernier Cri" was originally the Exceptional Story for July, 2022.

name: Mortal Kombat: Deception - Premium Pack
description:
Mortal Kombat: Deception (Premium Pack Bonus Disc) is a Fighting video game published by Midway released on October 4th, 2004 for the PlayStation 2.

Includes:

- An exclusive “Arcade Perfect” playable version of Mortal Kombat 1.
- 25 Character Video Bio’s, Including Mortal Kombat team commentary.
- History of the Mortal Kombat franchise movie.

name: My Little Universe
description: Creating a world isn’t easy, but it’s certainly a whole load of fun, as you’ll find out in this exciting casual worldbuilding adventure game. It takes mining, crafting, logging, digging, smelting, construction and a little gardening to make the perfect planet, and you’ll have to do all that while fighting off primeval monsters intent on bringing an end to your divine plan. Armed with just a pickaxe and the almighty strength of your arms, get down to doing a god’s work and build a world of wonder in this addictive, original action game.

name: Superman
description:
An enhanced version of the Superman game for Nintendo 64 which was cancelled due to license expiration. Although both games are related, the PlayStation version was going to have many improvements over the original game and a complete overhaul on the gameplay sequences, focusing on exploration and combat.

A late prototype was found and dumped online.

name: Teen Witches Academy
description: You will take the role of the Main Character, a powerful Mage who has been banned by the Magic World Council after they used him to win the hard war against Obscure Magic. He will be brought back to freedom by a mysterious powerful Mage Lord, called Gorath, the Lord of Corruption, who can give his power back. In return MC must accept to take the role of the headmaster in a Teen School of Magic, and bring all the teen witches to Corruption.

name: Fairy Tale Ending Encore
description:
Visual novel game focused on metafiction.
It is an indie game developed by Takano Senko.

You can download this in "Freem!".
Only Windows and Japanese version.

name: Bara Beach Bear
description: Help a hunky friend get off on the beach.

name: Black Coal
description: Put the coal into the boiler.

name: Boiling Over
description: Live your best life while combating the horrors of customer service and transphobia.

name: Bara Blackjack
description: Play blackjack against a beefy frisky orc.

name: Bouncy
description: A bouncy ball simulator.

name: Finding Cinderella
description: A lighthearted game about love and murder.

name: Boy with Cat
description:
A cat's inquisitive look interferes with the pleasurable sensations of a boy while masturbating.

A game based on the short film Boy With Cat (1966) from Donald Richie.

name: Breathe In
description: Breathe in is a game about Meditation. You control your focus, and must navigate your way to the 'breathe in' and 'breathe out' pick ups in order to focus on your breathing. Breathing lessens your tension which builds up over time, if you let your Tension get too high, you will lose the game.

name: Block Buster Billy
description: Baba is Number. Push blocks with digits around to create numbers and equations and solve puzzles.

name: Sonic and the Fallen Star
description: Sonic and The Fallen Star is a 2D speed-based platformer in the style of the 2D Classic Sonic games.

name: Genso Yonbaiken: Tenshi no Daigyakushu
description: A doujin game by Otoridenshi based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Jim the Spy
description: Jim The Spy is a sort of metroidvania 2D third-person shooter game. The player must complete a list of objectives in various levels filled with robots.

name: L-Racers
description: L-Racers is a minimalistic, retro, 1980s arcade-style old school game where you go head-to-head against another player (CPU or human) and be the last racer alive.

name: Dreamward
description: Dreamward started as a student pitch project at Carnegie Mellon University, Entertainment Technology Center. We created a puzzle-solving game experience combining novel gameplay with amazing art and music inspired by Tang and Tubo cultures.

name: Nell Watson's Founder Life
description: Master your personal resources to achieve startup business success in this pro bono entrepreneurial life simulator game.

name: AstroTrucks
description: Fly cargo spaceships and deliver materials in a realistic 6-DOF multiplayer simulation. VR and motion platform supported.

name: Ninja Specialist
description: Ninja Specialist is a unique, action-packed beat 'em up utilizing real-life actors. As Joe Kage, the last surviving member of an elite fighting force, you will have to brave the shadows of your own past and rise against the deadly Ninja Empire to obtain the Supreme Ninja Power.

name: Missing Persons
description: Missing Persons is a horror-survival game that you play as an officer to uncover the truths behind reported paranormal encounters and missing person cases near Southern California.

name: Under the Stars
description: In the vast space, where to go from time to time, the enemy crazy and difficult to deal with, and how to find a ray of life before energy exhaustion?

name: Pinball Girlfriend
description: An alternative to pinball games! ! Resource allocation, shooting skills, luck bonus, can you fight to the end? ? Of course, beautiful CG girls are also essential~

name: Tawako The Forest Hedgehog
description: Help Tawako to go through the forest and collect fruits in this Arkanoid-like game.

name: El Minero
description: A laid back 2D Platformer game based on the unsung daily lives of miners.

name: A toad well travelled
description: "A toad well travelled" is a short, but challenging, side-scrolling platformer about a young toad that sets off to explore the world outside the safety of his pond. You as the player, will guide the inquisitive toad through diverse, dangerous environments filled with not-so-friendly creatures.

name: The Legend of Azarias
description: Play the the Archangel Raphael in your quest to save the girl Sarah from Asmodeus's castle! Can you defeat the hordes of demons in this giant castle and save Sarah before it's too late? You need to travel the giant 13 floors and to get to the top in this action packed, first person dungeon crawler.

name: Nuts Protocol
description: You might think this is yet another Tower Defense game. Well, friend, you are not wrong! The twist? It's fast-paced! Your greatest resource is positioning - and moving around is a must. Also, you control an orange Squirrel equipped with more-than-military-grade turrets! OMG - can it get any better?

name: Inexperienced Driver
description: "Inexperienced Driver" is a top-down arcade driving game. The player has to drive from point A to point B and, if possible, collect all the banknotes on the road while avoiding obstacles.

name: Dark Jungle
description: Dark Jungle is a 2d fantasy adventure where you play as the great magician Dorian and find yourself in a fairytale forest.

name: Psychoscopy
description: Psychoscopy is a 5 player co-op horror game that you try to gather evidences about paranormal activities in large areas. Make a team with your 4 friends, take your equipments and hunt down paranormal activities.

name: Red Hood Adventure
description: Red Hood Adventure is a side-scrolling platform slasher game. An alternative story of Little Red Riding Hood, times are difficult and the Hat is armed with weapons. Grandma needs pies again and they need to be delivered. Creatures living in the forests also want pies, and maybe not only.

name: Elektrosoul
description: Awake the droid's consciousness taking control on the system against the timer!

name: Tomb Defender
description: Sandbox tower defense game in the style of a pulp adventure movie. With full control over the layout of the tomb. Includes challenges and a procedural map generator.

name: Heavenly Puzzle
description: Heavenly Puzzle - a puzzle game for manual dexterity and ingenuity. Assemble the whole picture from puzzle pieces. You can choose the difficulty, where time and number of lives are limited. You simply have to collect them all!

name: Guild Master Manager
description: Explore the world Missions Monsters Dungeons Battles Magic Brave Demon lord Magic. Participate to help the adventurers within the guild. to help adventurers roam the fantasy world

name: Mate
description: Mate is a third-person story-based game with a multi-ending game with puzzles and physical controls.The protagonist, the perpetrator of school violence, is anxious that his actions will be revealed to others, which leads to psychological hallucinations and nightmares.

name: Lion Heart Soushuu-hen
description: A compilation of four Touhou derivative games produced by LION HEART between 2005 and 2010.

name: Was it a Cat I Saw?
description: This game is designed to test the limits of patience and pain of gamers. Challenge yourself with passion! And take your cat to the top with a better record than your friends. If you clear this game, will you be able to understand why the cat is trying to climb high?

name: World End Girlfriend
description:
You've lived in Bunker 612 your entire life. After a devastating war brought the world to its knees, you're all that's left of humanity... right?

Everything you thought you knew is destroyed after your bunker is attacked. Now it's up to you and your best friends to scout the surface and secure a new home for the remaining humans. The road will be dangerous, but the companions you meet along the way will spark new hope and, maybe even romance...

name: My Forest Spirit Girlfriend
description:
This is it! Your final year of high school is almost over, and after that, you’ll be moving to the big city! Absolutely no one could convince you to stay in this small village… Right?

When a fateful encounter brings you into contact with three beautiful dryads, you soon find out that something terrible is going on behind the scenes in your village, and it’s up to you and your new friends to put a stop to it.

But just what are these girls? And are you strong enough to save them?

name: Doki Doki Sweets Girlfriend
description:
You’re a high school student that’s inherited a Japanese sweets shop. Business is slow, but one day a cute girl shows up on your doorstep saying she’s starving! You bring her inside and try to feed her some sweets, but she states he can only eat “Zunda Mochi,” a specialty of Northern Japan! You somehow manage to find some and bring it back to her and she suddenly regains her strength! She says her name is Tohoku Zunko and that if you want your business to succeed, you need to start selling... Zunda mochi!

She ends up staying with you to help your business, but things start to get a little crazy when her two sisters show up!

Will you be able to take your store to the next level with her special zunda mochi? Will you be able to unlock the secrets of their hearts?

name: Can You Escape Grand Canyon
description:
Shining rock surfaces, rays of sunlight pouring down
A mansion nestled in the Grand Canyon's majestic landscapes, with a riddle to solve.
Will you be able to collect the hidden clues and escape from the mansion?

Enjoy a relaxing time surrounded by rocks and greenery.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: A port of Sonic the Hedgehog for the Master System to the Commodore 64

name: Nukitashi 2
description: A new battle begins for Junnosuke—backed by the FS Big Three! “This is what it truly means for the minority to get vengeance.”

name: Goonect
description: This is a 3D action game in which two players hold hands and move forward together.

name: Hoosegow
description: Hoosegow is a dark comedy about survival and adventure in a prison. At the beginning you get character, a crime and a prison sentence. Your task is to make the right choices to survive. Live by the thieves' laws, keep your shank with you and trust no one.

name: Super Black Bass
description: Compete in four exciting tournaments against top anglers for the celebrated title of Super Bass Champion.

name: Heroish
description: Play as one of six epic heroes, summon troops, sling spells, and destroy enemy towers to achieve victory in this exciting head-to-head castle defense game. Players can enjoy single-player adventures with three campaigns filled with campy storytelling, sweeping musical scores, and hand-crafted environments. Or they can dive into fast-paced battles with friends and family in competitive 1v1 or 2v2 matches. Players can build custom decks and upgrade cards to create monstrous combinations of troops and spells as they aim to defeat their opponents, destroy the Soul Gem that gives them power, and move to the top of the leaderboards.

name: Subway Surfers Tag
description: Join the Crew across multiple off-limit, interactive city locations. Skate over the retired trains in the railyard, play in the park after dark, pick up some power-ups at the cargo docks or investigate the mysterious underground. But watch out! Guard is not about to put up with these shenanigans and is hot on your heels - and this time, he’s brought reinforcements!

name: Domestic Elementalism
description:
The plants that grow out of your bedroom walls are associated with Earth. The fairy lights strung across your kitchen are associated with Fire. Change an object's element, and the object will turn into something else.

As a research witch, elemental transformation is second nature to you. And that's just as well, because your house is malfunctioning, and you'll need to use everything you know to put it right.

name: Secrets of the Valley
description: Secrets of the Valley tells the story of a man who ran away from a troubled past in search of a future worth living.

name: It Feeds
description: An adventurer embarks on a dangerous quest.

name: Lucha Caliente
description: Are you ready for the Luchador final exam? Get in the ring!

name: Press the alphabetically first letter
description: A game with a self-explanatory title.

name: Book Recommendations
description: A short game by Stephen Lavelle.

name: LEGO DC Super-Villains: Aquaman Movie Level Pack 1
description: The first of two packs for LEGO DC Super-Villains inspired by the 2018 film Aquaman. It includes Aquaman, Black Manta, Mera, Orm, and more.

name: PopCultured
description:
You'll start with three different types of media (movies, TV, books, video games, and songs). The goal is to guess which year they all premiered/released. If you are on a keyboard, you can type your answers.

You have six tries to find the right answer. Depending on how close you are, the box will light up with a different color. It's up to you determine whether to go higher or lower.

name: Touhou Puppet Dance Performance: Shard of Dreams
description: Touhou Puppet Dance Performance is a spiritual successor to the Pokémon FireRed hack Touhou Puppet Play, involving training and collecting puppets of various Touhou characters.

name: Touhou Gendanshou: Unlimited Heroes
description: A doujin game by INSIDE SYSTEM based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Touhou Gendanshou X: Unlimited Heroes
description: A doujin game by INSIDE SYSTEM based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Touhou Gendanshou Y: Unlimited Heroes
description: A doujin game by INSIDE SYSTEM based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Weird City Interloper
description:
An interactive tale of strange conspiracy.

Pull up your hood, lower your gaze and enter the city of Zendon. If you can gather enough information, you may just be able to change the course of history.

(Weird City Interloper is a shallow but broad conversation game.)

name: Jetbike Gang
description:
You're a member of a jetbike gang.
Tiny Twine game for the Twiny Jam.
Exactly 300 words.

name: Wolverine: Adamantium Rage
description: Released in 1994 for both the Super NES and the Sega Genesis, Wolverine: Adamantium Rage is a platform-action video game. Teeny Weeny Games developed the Genesis version, while the Super NES version was created by Bits Studios. Despite being developed independently, the two versions share a common opening storyline and gameplay, though they differ in certain key aspects. Notably, it is one of the pioneering video games to incorporate a recharging health system.

name: Baby Shark: ABC Phonics
description: Sin descripción

name: Song by the Sea
description:
Abandoned, alone and without purpose, you’ve never felt so isolated after your parent’s divorce. Taken in by your grandmother, your days drift by aimlessly in a picturesque town by the ocean.

During a midnight stroll you’re drawn to the sea by a mysterious song, the melodic singing of a siren on the beach…

With this fateful encounter your journey of self-acceptance, friendship and love begins.

name: LEGO DC Super-Villains: Aquaman Pack 2
description: The second of two packs for LEGO DC Super-Villains inspired by the 2018 film Aquaman. It includes Aquaman, Vulko, Trench, Murk, Brine King, and Orm.

name: Hummingbird's Crown
description:
Wren is a hardworking book editor who has recently turned 30 and begins to ruminate about her life.

‘What does it mean to be an adult? Why does my job make me feel incomplete? Why do I feel like I don't fit anywhere?'

Her only solace is gaming and her small group of 2 online friends, Kanaria and Lonan, who she sometimes chats and plays with.

On May 31st, taking advantage of an upcoming long weekend, Kanaria suggests they should finally meet in person at the upcoming GameCon, a medium-sized local game event from Solstice City.

Unfortunately, the day of the event itself, a terrible accident happens at the Eon Building, the place where it's being held. Wren panics and doesn't know what to do until... huh?

Why is it suddenly May 31st again? Did she just go back in time?!

name: A Bird's Tale
description: Help keep a happy home in this short hand-crafted platformer telling a touching tale about a bird, it's children and their home.

name: Ingression
description: Ingression is an unforgiving & mind-bending precision platformer where you'll think and platform with seamless portals. Play as Rina, a thief living in the year 2442 in the corrupt Galactic Empire. Travel to the future to save the past from a tremendous time paradox. Fulfill your destiny of keeping time intact.

name: Sporting Clays
description: Sin descripción

name: Diffraction
description:
Otome visual novel with a focus on connections and friendship.

A quiet coming-of-age story about how photography changed the lives of three people in a rainy small town and the paths in life they took with it.

name: Stupid Zombies 2
description: The undead return in this new, jam-packed release with exciting, brainless creatures, weapons, puzzles, moody environments all wrapped up in a slick, player-friendly package. They say you can’t kill what is already dead, but it can’t hurt to make a splash by shooting in their general direction.

name: Stupid Zombies 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Klifur
description: A squishy physics puzzle game. Click and drag your hands and feet to reach the target hold. Reach the top in 12 levels and then beat the developer's best route to earn a star in each.

name: Breath of Fire III
description:
Capcom's third installment of its epic RPG. Breath of Fire III is the first installment of the Breath of Fire Series to appear on the PlayStation (And later ported to the PSP).

Set free by the the workers of Dauna Mine, Ryu of the Brood learns to both understand his power, and to understand the history of his extinct kind. By both utilizing Ryu's unique power and the abilities of those whom assist him, players will uncover the history of the Brood, learn more about the characters, and the very reason why the Brood were wiped out.
Players control Ryu and his allies on their journey, each of Ryu's friends have abilities only they can use, and they will have to work together to make their way through the obstacles and enemies that they encounter; creativity is key to your success in this game!

name: Dysmantle: Underworld
description: Answer to the Call of Mana and embark on a new adventure into a world beyond. Unlock new powerful abilities that will also help you on your journey on the main island.

name: Lkyt.
description:
Every thousand years, the Dark Reign rises and pushes forth to destroy all humanity, but those of the Shoreline Nation have dedicated their lives to defending the world from this recurring threat, using the magic within themselves and their bonds between each other to stave off these vicious foes. It is here that Tasuku trains, expecting the next rise to come generations later, but now as signs of the Dark Reign are uncovered with their nation still unprepared, Tasuku finds himself thrust into a battle that will determine the fate of the world.

Can two people find hope for the future with an outlook so bleak? Is it possible for friendship to turn into intimacy on the eve of humanity's destruction? Can love save the world?

name: How a Healthy Hentai Administers Public Service
description: How a Healthy Hentai Administers Public Service is an erotic comedy developed by CLOCKUP, where we follow the daily life of Jin Sintani, the precinct's newest sex officer charged with serving the community and protecting the peaceful citizens of Vaginville from the threat of sexual frustration.

name: Hello Kitty Pocket Camera
description: Hello Kitty Pocket Camera was a cancelled version of Nintendo's Game Boy Camera. It was only discovered after a data breach in September 2020 which leaked the game online.

name: Dance Dance Revolution: Hello Kitty
description: Dance Dance Revolution: Hello Kitty (DDR Hello Kitty) is a Bemani Pocket Hello Kitty/Dance Dance Revolution game.

name: LEGO DC Super-Villains: Batman - The Animated Series Level Pack
description: A character pack for LEGO DC Super-Villains, introducing characters from Batman: The Animated Series such as Batman, Two-Face, Captain Clown, Harley Quinn, Joker, The Phantasm, Man-Bat, and Mad Hatter.

name: Dark and Darker
description: An unforgiving hardcore fantasy FPS dungeon PvPvE adventure. Band together with your friends and use your courage, wits, and cunning to uncover mythical treasures, defeat gruesome monsters, while staying one step ahead of the other devious treasure-hunters.

name: Eternal Hearts: Curse of the Endless
description: Eternal Hearts: Curse of the Endless is an action deckbuilding rogue-like where each battle lets you switch between intense, real-time action and time-stopping tactical breathers. Absorb your enemies' powers, liberate the souls of your predecessors and finally, end your curse.

name: Yeah Jam Fury
description: Yeah Jam Fury tests your speed and ingenuity in over 40 levels of smiling face blocks. Utilize all three of your egos to create blocks, scale walls, and destroy everything in the way of your righteous fruit!

name: Cruise Ship Manager
description: Manage your own Cruise Ship! Maintain your vessel and sell tickets to the wealthiest of passengers. Issue orders to your crew and keep their morale high. Choose the layout of your ship and the kind of amenities you want to offer. Keep the prices right, passengers satisfied, and your wallet full!

name: Tower Defender: Hero Wars
description: Fight and defend your towers as the head of an army! Make deployment routes, release supernatural abilities, conquer enemy towers and obtain victory. Congratulations, outstanding attack and defense strategist!

name: Paperback Vol. 2
description: Word-building meets deck-building in the unique game Paperback Vol. 2

name: Dream Magic Will
description: In a magical forest, animals began to occupy the territory of other animals for unknown reasons. In order to find out the truth, a team guarding the forest was born!Build a guard force to prevent enemy invasion and explore the truth of the forest!

name: Putrid Shot Ultra
description: A chaotic shoot-em-up roguelite with magic spell casting. Defeat enemies with your gun! Stack tons of passive spells that trigger when you shoot while weaving your unique active spell in between. Blast your enemies with gunfire and magic spells while you dodge through the rubble.

name: Alwa's Awakening: The 8-Bit Edition
description: Use your magic staff and progress through a large interconnected world where you’ll solve puzzles, fight enemies and defeat bosses in order to help free the land of Alwa. Explore and uncover the secrets by using your platforming skills in this challenging and charming 8-bit adventure game.

name: Formula Bit Racing DX
description: Formula Bit Racing DX is a fun arcade racing game, where each curve and lap recreate classic gameplay and offers you unbound speed limits of fun. Full throttle and enjoy!

name: The Bear B
description: The clicking adventure you and your friends need. Catch fish with the main hero of the game The Bear B and chatch all the fish in the world!

name: Coffee Break: Head to Head
description: Sin descripción

name: Shred! Remastered
description: With flowy level design and addictive gameplay - every inch of trail will keep you on the edge and keep you coming back for more! A total remake of “Shred! 1” remade with love, from the ground up.

name: Herbtales
description: An herb picking RPG.

name: Block Blitz
description: The classic BBC Micro game ported to Playdate

name: Blocks!
description: A puzzle game

name: Tankette
description: Tankette is a small, unfolding arcade game where you are the crew of a tiny tank.

name: Lemonade Stand
description: Lemonade Stand for Playdate

name: Braaains!
description: Party trivia...but with zombies

name: Cranky Bird
description: A flappy adventure with a cranky bird for Playdate.

name: Fish'n Feathers
description: Fish are falling from the sky in this arcade fishing mashup for Playdate

name: Avava
description: A quick reaction puzzle game – Find the missing rune to please the gods.

name: Addled
description: Classic puzzling with some new twists

name: Tochi II: Senshi
description:
Tochi II: Senshi is set in an abandoned settlement filled with traps that was once home to The Knights of Senshi!

Explore the Senshi settlement with your mysterious companion Amori! But be careful of the monsters that will strike you down the moment they see you! And if you die it's game over!

name: By the Pier
description: A simple fishing game for the Playdate

name: Dungeon Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: Parasite Pack
description: Flea! and Tapeworm Disco Puzzle team up for nostalgia and challenge

name: Sabotris
description: Sabotris is a strategic, competitive, 3D block stacking game, but with a twist: you can sabotage your opponents, but be careful; you can also end up sabotaging yourself! Choose to play either by yourself to beat your own high score, against your friends or other players, or even against computer AI!

name: Redaxium 2
description: Appease God every 6 days or die! Find a way to break the cycle of ritual sacrifice.

name: The Ballad of Radolf
description: After years of peace an island emerges from the sea with the Demon race, now the Demon race threatens to throw the world into chaos. Can you stop the Demon race and restore peace to the world in this turn based RPG.

name: Prophecy Matrix
description: You need to find keys and exits in the prophecy matrix, you can use card props to avoid danger。The Prophecy Matrix will continue to grow, you have to crack the Prophecy Matrix's secret.

name: Just Sign!
description: Just Sign! is a 1-4 players tower defense online/local co-op, where you build the turrets. Get resources, refine and craft them into defenses to counter various enemies and bosses on dynamic maps.

name: Backrooms of Reality
description: A game in which you navigate through backrooms' mazes and solving simple environmental puzzles. Sometimes you may encounter some creatures that live there. The game contains horror elements.

name: FurBalls Racing
description: FurBalls Racing is a platforming racing game that's fun for players of all skill levels! Roll, wall jump, spin drift, and... shoot poop?... as a squishy, fuzzy FurBall while rushing towards the finish line!... and avoiding poop.

name: Project Romboid
description: Project Romboid is a hard, arcade shooter roguelite in which you will have to pick and combine items so that you can survive waves of enemies that will chase you and shoot at you. New items will appear every level. Combine them to create powerful builds that will help you survive.

name: Away From Life
description: You are left alone with yourself in the middle of the Indian Ocean, fighting for survival with the wildlife of the nearest islands and the ocean elements.

name: QuVerse
description: QuVerse is exciting and challenging action matching puzzle. Basic rule is very simple, Make top of Cube to same color. but this world's system is unstable, for matching color of Cube, you should move Logically and swiftly. Challenge your Limit, break the record!

name: Omnichess
description: Omnichess is the game that allows you to design and play your very own chess variants! With AI and online play there are a huge variety of options.

name: Astrid
description: Washed ashore in a strange unknown land after a shipwreck, Astrid must traverse her way through monsters and men alike in an attempt to return home. Dangers lurk around every corner and she doesn't know who to trust.

name: Vikindor
description: Vikindor - Side-Scroller Platformer, a game with random generation, where the player in each level gets into a randomly generated world of the underworld, with its enemies, unique locations, chests and other traps. Each race will be different from the next!

name: SnailQuest
description: A Puzzle Game Based On 2048 Move Style

name: Grindshift
description: Grindshift is a stylized hoverboard game with ramps, rails and jumps. There are no gameplay objectives or unlockables, just endless hoverboard riding and score counting.

name: Dreamland
description: Boy and Suicide Day and Dream Universe

name: Where Is Here: New Home
description: A sci-fi, survival horror and first-person game. The player will encounter numerous of creatures and characters that involves a mystery to be unraveled on all worlds, finding clues and going through portals. The player progresses through exploration and may die if they fail to avoid the monsters.

name: Shards of Nogard
description: Shards of Nogard is a powerful, evocative fantasy adventure game that will surprise you with fastpaced combat, mind-boggling puzzles, beautiful hand-crafted environments and an immersive story about the eternal battle set in the medieval fantasy world.

name: The Riflemen
description: The Riflemen is a fun, fast-paced low poly FPS game where matches are short and full of action! All players start with bolt-action rifles & knives that they don't need to reload. Players can customize their weapons & characters to get the look that they want!

name: Seqitaire
description: Seqitaire is a Solitaire-inspired, number-crunching puzzle game.

name: Hausmeister
description: A first-person horror game about a janitor, whose day turns stranger by the minute. This game features some random events, that make every playthrough slightly different.

name: Something's Wrong With Sunny Day Jack
description: Navigate your relationships and figure out the truth behind the ghost of a 80s children's TV show host who's been haunting you in this fully voiced R-18 visual novel filled with nostalgia, romance, and horror. Can everyone get their happily ever after?

name: Alla Prima
description: A starving artist desperate for money and validation joins a religious cult, unaware of the god-seeking ritual she's diving head first into. Explore your environment, solve puzzles and uncover your past to make sense of yourself and the reality unfolding in front of you.

name: DEPO: Death Epileptic Pixel Origins
description: DEPO is a first person 3D platformer where you control a rebel pixel inside a computer with an evil Operating System governing everything. You'll find final bosses, cinematic scenes, arcade mini-games, 50 huge levels full of surprises, ¡and big stories to discover!

name: Level Tank
description: Blast your way through swarms of enemies in this action-packed top-down shooter. Upgrade your tank, collect power ups, and survive against a wide variety of enemies while exploring diverse maps in multiple different game modes! How long will you last before getting overrun?

name: Blade of Ten
description: Blade of Ten is a Fighting Adventure game set in a Fantasy World filled with Mystery. You will encounter a variety of Creatures and Characters, explore Vast Areas and maneuver around the highest of ledges with your Helicopter Jump. Vanquish the forces of evil, or Race against them in Go Kart mode!

name: Rusty Seas
description: A game about furry girls fighting over junk on the beach.

name: Galxagar
description: "Don't go to Galxagar"; a phrase uttered by many who have traversed its rim. Untold treasures, and terrors, await within its blackened depths. Ready your craft, spacefarer, because you're about to enter the most dangerous sector in all the stars. Get ready.. for Galxagar!

name: Mythic Origins
description: Explore an infinite, procedurally generated labyrinth. Discover a world packed with puzzles, enemies, bosses, and treasure. Join forces with fellow heroes to hunt down the gods, or strike out alone and be the first to discover uncharted territory. Become Mythic.

name: Perfect Boyfriend
description: Moving to another city is always stressful: new people, new places, new rules. Fortunately, the city is full of guys who will be happy to help you. Who knows, maybe one of them could become more than just a friend, huh?

name: First Time in Rome
description: Travel blogger Kate Robinson and her daughter Nicole are headed to Rome for a big job with a local tourism agency!

name: Space Major Miner
description: Space is dark and full of terror... and raw resources! Mine asteroids, upgrade your equipment and blast cosmic aliens.

name: The Wasted Knight
description: Take control of a knight too intoxicated to remember his own control scheme in this quirky, pixel, procedural, roguelite, where your control scheme constantly changes. Is jump A? Or X? How about RT? Who knows? The knight certainly doesn’t. *Controller required*

name: Music Store Simulator
description: With Music Store Simulator you can lead a musical instruments manufacturing company. Create, sell, earn and reinvest improving and developing your business. Expand your Brand and climb to success in order to become the world's largest manufacturer of musical instruments!

name: Estencel
description: Slash your way through Estencel! Traverse across a corrupted, maze like city fighting horrors. Customize and arm yourself into the ultimate monster killing assassin in this fast paced horror/fantasy Action RPG. Solve the mysteries of this world before they swallow you whole.

name: My Trainer is a Futanari
description: You decided to make the commitment of signing up for a full membership at your local gym. Your personal trainer, Kendra, has abs of steel and she's full of surprises!

name: Be
description: Build, relax or explore in a beautiful world. Chill out next to a lake or build crazy structures (with friends!) Choose your own weather & time of day.

name: Death Noodle Delivery
description:
It's your first day of work for Death Noodle Delivery Inc. Ride your hoverboard and try to survive in a cyberpunk world on the brink of collapse. Deliver the noodles, hack the hoverboard and build cat bombs. You may find that this world hides a filthy secret.

Upgrade your old hoverboard from a rusty ironing board to a perfected killing machine. Jailbreak AI paywalls and unlock new power-ups that let you manipulate time and launch explosive cats!

Talk to your neighbours and find out their dirty stories. Browse the web for hacks and pleasure. Survive long enough, and you may discover that this world hides a terrible secret.

name: Guarding Goddess
description: The demon army is invading and the Goddess is in danger! At the most critical moment, you lead many heroes, equip the artifacts and fight for the Goddess! Together with your friends, fight against the demon army and become a legend in the pantheon!

name: Chemistry World
description: Chemistry World is a game where education and fun are paramount, this game is made with low-end hardware in mind. It is an open-world game with different storylines that contain different chemistry topics.

name: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy
description: Jorel’s Brother and The Most Important Game of the Galaxy is a point-and-click adventure about an eight-year-old boy who lives with his eccentric family in the shadow of Jorel, his handsome and popular brother. Based on the award-winning Brazilian animation Jorel’s Brother.

name: In the Workplace of Madness
description: A monstrous entity looms over the employees of an insurance company. Theo, A normal office worker, finds himself engulfed in a deadly nightmare with no way out as secrets about the workplace are uncovered.

name: Diode Arena
description: Diode Arena is a free to play vehicle arena game where you can build your own custom vehicle and use it in online PvP matches.

name: Lewd Gym
description: In this gym, you will training with cute monster girls and accept the Orgasm control training.Fucking exciting, isn't it?

name: The Mourne's
description: The Mourne's is a work-in-progress relaxing Adventure game with some emphasis on Puzzle Solving and can be done either Solo or with some friends :)

name: Usagi Health Club
description: A casual visual novel with minigames that let you had fun and reward you with having special time with the bunny girls. Get choose who you want to be your escort girl for the night and play minigames to win special scene as a reward! But be careful not to be too addicted.

name: Soul Shard
description: Soul Shard is a 3D platformer, 2-player local coop game set in a Victorian London Steampunk factory. Nimue and her sidekick Ambrose, a cyborg bear, are on a mission to destroy the factory so that it can no longer produce cyborg laborers that the owner has been using to replace the working class.

name: OutWave
description: Endless car chase is a fast retro style paced game in which you must collect money and avoid the cops! The game supports Windows, Mac, Linux. Use keyboard or gamepad. Buy and control a cars or motorbikes. Listen to retro music and don't get caught by the cops! The game looks like a gif!

name: A Mage Reborn
description: Walk the path of a legendary mage, combining four different schools of magic to devastating effects.

name: Lost Paws
description: Survive as a stray dog in a large open world. Scavenge, craft, trade, and steal your way into a world where all the pets disappear. Arm yourself and take to the streets to rise from homeless to well-off no matter what it takes. What kind of story will you tell?

name: Nightmare Hunter
description: Nightmare Hunter is an arcade game where you have to defeat the coming nightmares.

name: Spellic
description: Spellic is a arcade action wizard shooter. With your keyboard, cast spells like fireballs to defeat your enemies or help your allies in various multiplayer battles.

name: Mist Guard
description: Mist Guard is an Action RPG where you have to escape a dark, mysterious prison. Explore, fight enemies and upgrade your character to escape.

name: Chunkers
description: Chunkers is a casual, multiplayer first person shooter set in a voxel world where you and your friends are in a world made of cubes where you can build and fight in various game modes!

name: Wastebraver: A Tiny Survival Tale
description: Wastebraver is a roguelite survival rpg set in a post-apocalyptic fantasy hellscape. Explore an open, dynamic world where evils beyond imagination haunt your every footstep. Execute abominations and weave through insane encounters as you fight for what little remains of your broken world.

name: Smashboard
description: Smashboard is a fast-paced action game where you constantly defeat bosses while dodging their attacks and attacking them when you can. As you defeat enemies, you will earn their charms and use them as upgrades to face other bosses after creating a build for your own play style.

name: The Wraith of the Galaxy
description: The Wraith of the Galaxy is a third-person space combat game.

name: Cards of Binokee
description: In this turn-based online trading card game, you can face off against different opponents with your deck of cards over and over again. With the orbs you earn, you can constantly expand your card collection and thus redesign and strengthen your deck.

name: The Stone Cutter and the Mountain Spirit
description: When a poor stone cutter gets tired of his simple life, the Mountain Spirit make his wishes come true! A beautiful Interactive Fairy Tale about the Wills that move us and the Transformations we go through in our lives.

name: Exodus Vigil
description: Explore the Dark and Dangerous Temples and Tombs of Ancient Egypt in this story-driven 3D puzzle game. Follow the familiar story of the Israelite Exodus from the Egyptian perspective.

name: Worm Runner
description: Endless runner game where are 6 different maps with obstacles

name: Throne of Bone
description: Draft minions to defeat those who oppose the honest work of necromancy. Learn spells, forge relics, and restore your castle to unite the land through undeath in this rogue-like amalgam of turn-based combat and strategic engine-building.

name: Flesh Everest
description: Explore a randomized facility built within a massive living mountain of flesh. Flesh Everest mixes a rogue-like survival experience with shooting mechanics inspired by Silent Hill and Resident Evil. Death is permanent and ammo is limited.

name: DreamIsland
description: This game is an action exploration game where you complete various missions and collect 51 cards. The map is an open world, and you'll have to solve people's problems and unravel the mysteries of the world from a vast map!

name: Rain Ruin
description: FPS walking simulator type psychological horror game. Lost in the mountains and sheltering from the rain in her ruins, she had no choice but to reveal her night in the ruins. As she relies on her smartphone's lights to explore the pitch-black ruins, she hears a cry out of nowhere.

name: The Empanada Protocol
description: In this brutal platformer you play as an Empanada trying to escape a dangerous facility filled with traps and fun gimmicks. Do you have the skill and precision to escape?

name: Runaway Animals
description: Runaway Animals is a 1-4 player co-op & PvP action-comedy game. A mysterious man with a monkey freeing wild animals in captivity. What could go wrong? Complete your duties at your underpaid job while you cope with these uncontrollable animals in this story-driven adventure.

name: Hello Again
description: Welcome to the world's coziest time loop! Hello Again is a puzzling adventure game set on an island filled with ancient ruins. Explore strange structures, solve clockwork puzzles, and befriend cute characters to uncover the island's secrets and break the loop.

name: ChessVR
description: Board a spaceship and commence a game of wit in the vast universe! Take the lead, attack ferociously but defend cautiously, and give your opponent the final blow. You may also follow the ship to travel, guess which mysterious scene you will end up?

name: Unity of Command II: Desert Rats
description: You will take command of the vastly outnumbered Allied forces as they attempt to stop first the Italians, and then the Germans in the form of the vaunted Afrika Korps. From a token force of a few divisions, your army will expand into a vast force of more than a quarter-million men.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Pro Train Class 68 DRS
description: The Class 68 is a type of mainline mixed traffic diesel-electric locomotive manufactured by Stadler Rail (and previously by Vossloh España) for Direct Rail Services (DRS) in the United Kingdom.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pro Train Class 68 DRS
description: The Class 68 is a type of mainline mixed traffic diesel-electric locomotive manufactured by Stadler Rail (and previously by Vossloh España) for Direct Rail Services (DRS) in the United Kingdom.

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train Class 68 DRS
description: The Class 68 is a type of mainline mixed traffic diesel-electric locomotive manufactured by Stadler Rail (and previously by Vossloh España) for Direct Rail Services (DRS) in the United Kingdom.

name: Stranded Nightmare
description: In this Indie Horror Game you are playing as a stranded Sailor who tries to find a way to escape the Island. But there are some strange things going on! Created with Unreal Engine 5, this game offers a thrilling horror experience with good graphics and combat action! Let's see how brave you are.

name: XanChuchamel
description: XanChuchamel is a puzzle-platformer where you will need skill but also intelligence to overcome each challenge. Xan can catch blocks and place them in different places to access new areas. 50 levels are waiting for you!

name: Caphaclus Recommence
description: Caphaclus is a world that takes place in a world set in medieval times. Remnants or a more futuristic world exists. Nobody knows much of the past of the planet. You embark on an adventure to discover secret relics and uncover the truth to the planet of Caphaclus.

name: Devil's Deck: Astray Destiny
description: This content requires the base game Devil's Deck on Steam in order to play.

name: Midnight Report
description: "Midnight Report" is a rogue-lite 3D survival horror game in which a student (the protagonist) who is having hallucinations while staying up all night writing a report struggles to escape from the hallucinations filled with terrifying monsters. Players use items and gimmicks to overcome threats and aim to escape from the randomly generated fantasy world with their friends.

name: Ukraina Battle Tank!: Putin Edition
description: Awaken inside a battle Tank in the middle of nowhere around Ukraine. You have to fight for your life against the invasion of the angry Russian tanks and Mr. Putin junior's henchman while vibing with hardbass. Be the slavic bullet hell.

name: The Alchemist
description: Play the role of an apprentice alchemist on the road in a merchant caravan. During the journey you will discover many things, including love? A gay medieval fantasy visual novel.

name: Night Dreams
description: "This is not the world you should live in" - the surreal words left by the mysterious man who broke into the house, the smooth college life turns out to be a repetitive circle of the same. The only way to return to reality is to face your own heart.

name: Real Estate Tycoon
description: "Real Estate Tycoon" is a simulated business role-playing game with urban theme. We try to restore the game world like a novel of urban face slapping, and give the players a "capitalist" identity.

name: Quadratic Puzzle 5
description: "Quadratic puzzle 5" is an erotic puzzle game.

name: Wassie Tale
description: Wassie Tale tells the story of one courageous Wassie & their treacherous journey. Hop, fly, swim & slam your way across diverse levels in this lore-rich, challenging 2D Side Scroller. Do you have what it takes to become the savior of all Wassie-kind?

name: Shadows of Taumiel
description: First-person horror game that includes several genres such as stealth, platforming and exploration.

name: Mega Demon Blaster
description: Blast demons until you can't escape no more! Mega Demon Blaster is a casual arena based shooter where you create builds for your weapon and try to break the game before you die! Enemies comes in waves and they get stronger and stronger but luckily you do to.

name: Merchants of Sol
description: Command a fleet of merchant ships in this story-driven strategy game. Manipulate markets, dominate trade, make investments; do anything that you can to get rich regardless of morality or legality. Starve a population of supplies just to sell them later at a massively inflated price? Good idea.

name: Night At the Gates of Hell
description: From the sick mind behind Bloodwash, Jordan King, comes his latest experiment in terror. Inspired by the Italian zombie flicks from Lucio Fulci and Bruno Mattei, Night of the Gates of Hell promises to be a blood dripping, neon soaked, flesh rotting experience.

name: Seres
description: There are more than 300 countries on the continent of Seres, more than 6,000 units of Knights, and a lot of events. Which country to choose? What kind of Knights' combination? How to deploy the Knights to the Member countries?Players can make their own decisions to unify the Seres continent .

name: FPS Chess
description:
Play an ordinary game of chess against a friend or a stranger.
However, all your intricate strategies will crumble before the enemy rook's sniper trick-shot.
All your practiced openings and counters will amount to nothing before the enemy queen's randomly sprayed machine gun.
You finally checkmate the king. Unfortunately, it seems you are not ready for this fight. 5 seconds in and you've been sliced in half by the king's sword.
It turns out you are not playing Chess at all, but an FPS. Just make sure to practice your aim!

name: CivClicker
description: A civilization builder right in your browser. Click to gather basic resources, create villagers, and put them to work to build your empire.

name: Fishing: North Atlantic - Complete Edition
description: Commercial fishing in North Atlantic!

name: Alfred Hitchcock: Vertigo - Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Game: Alfred Hitchcock: Vertigo
- 48-Pages Official Artbook
- Digital Artbook
- Digital Original Soundtrack

name: The Sims 4: High School Years
description: Class is in session! Be a good (or bad) student, join after-school activities, explore aesthetics, start trends, find your identity, and make the most of being a teenager with The Sims 4 High School Years Expansion Pack.

name: Monster Hunter Rise + Sunbreak
description: Experience Monster Hunter Rise and its massive expansion Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak in one convenient set!

name: The Dark Prince
description: The Dark Prince is a fantasy romance visual novel about an arranged marriage between a daemon prince and a fae princess. Play as Princess Euphymia Tarafin on a quest to revive her lost magic and save her kingdom from the wrath of the daemons. The story features political tension and enemies-to-lovers romance.

name: Mario + Rabbids Sparks of Hope: Gold Edition
description:
The Gold Edition of the game includes:
- The base game
- The season pass which contains upcoming DLC packs, including additional story content featuring new heroes, quests, and battles.
- Galactic Prestige Pack, with three exclusive and supremely stylish weapon skins for your team, unlockable right away.

name: Mario + Rabbids Sparks of Hope: Cosmic Edition
description: Comes with the base game and the Galactic Prestige Collection.

name: Blade Assault
description: Blade Assault is a 2D action rogue-lite platformer with beautiful pixel art set in a desolate sci-fi world. Fight against the corrupt military of Esperanza as part of the resistance force of the Undercity. Bring the corrupt to justice by becoming stronger and fighting alongside your trusty comrades.

name: NBA 2K23
