description: Rise to the occasion in NBA 2K23. Showcase your talent in MyCareer. Pair All-Stars with timeless legends in MyTeam. Build your own dynasty in MyGM, or guide the NBA in a new direction with MyLeague. Take on NBA or WNBA teams in "Play Now" and feel true-to-life gameplay.

name: Psychonauts 2: Motherlobe Edition
description: Razputin “Raz” Aquato, trained acrobat and powerful young psychic, has realized his lifelong dream of joining the international psychic espionage organization known as the Psychonauts! But these psychic super spies are in trouble. Their leader hasn’t been the same since he was rescued from a kidnapping, and what’s worse, there’s a mole hiding in headquarters.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - Collector's Edition
description:
Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - Collector's Edition includes:
- The boxed game
- The Taiko Drum Set: containing two drumsticks

name: Isle of Rein
description: Isle of Rein is a thirty minute adventure that takes place on Rein, an unobserved island in the Hudson Bay. You are a young agent tasked with investigating the research team's communication absence. Upon visiting the island, you must adjust to extreme circumstances.

name: Girls' Civilization 3
description: Open world survival RPG with unique lore and story.

name: Ballads at Midnight
description: When a sarcastic bard is arrested and exiled to an abandoned castle, she expected to be at the mercy of a hungry, blood-thirsty vampire. She soon discovers that the vampire, Lucius, is not starving: he is gravely bored. She may just survive on borrowed time, one ballad each midnight.

name: Kenomaze
description: Explore a strange maze full of colorful friends and foes. When the time comes, the path you’ve chosen will determine your fate... and perhaps the fate of others as well.

name: 9 Childs Street
description: This is a first-person indie horror game. In 9 Childs Street you will find the terrifying atmosphere of a recently abandoned house, and its captive inhabitants, through the eyes of a curious little boy in a red cap.

name: ZombWave
description: A zombie virus has hit the entire planet. the human species is on its knees. You take on the role of a soldier who survived a helicopter crash when returning to a base that was under attack. If you want to obey your order you have to face thousands of zombies.

name: Battle Tracks
description: Blast through waves of enemy brigades or compete against your friends in Battle Tracks, a top-down action-adventure. Fight your way across unknown battlefields and against thousands of enemy tanks. Earn stars to compete against the enemy boss and advance to the next arena!

name: Invader Signal
description: Invader Signal - In this game, you choose a certain color of your charge to destroy asteroids flying in your direction, which can change their colors and cluster. You need to be careful when striking, as spaceships are constantly flying in front of you, which cannot be touched!

name: Deadly Night
description: Carol is down on her luck, hitchhiking across the country. She arrives at a small roadside motel but there's something strange about the owner. As the secrets unravel, she finds herself entangled in a long, DEADLY NIGHT! Can she escape from hellish nightmare or will she die trying?

name: Two Identical
description: Two Identical - Find a pair game, each picture has its own copy, and you need to find it quickly. Difficulty levels will not let you get bored. Develop yourself and train your memory.

name: Chompies!
description: Chompies! is a cute couch / online sports game where you fight for the ball to reach the top of the level and score a goal.

name: Fort Flow
description: Navigate this flying castle, fight a variety of enemies, unlock rich cards and stories, and lead the way out of the siege!

name: Mouse People
description: Mouse people is an experiential commercial game. Please use your mouse to click, drag and destroy people and things. Be chill , face up to your your own thoughts.

name: The Fallen God's Chronicles: Dmet Prison
description: Sent to the prison plane where Dmet the fallen god of carnage is imprisoned, you will have to fight your way back to the primary plane where life still makes sense, but you won't be alone there as others have been sent before and probably you won't be the last to arrive!

name: RoadRace
description: Choose your little car and race!

name: Tiny Golf Adventure
description: Challenge yourself in a simple, arcade-like golf game set in a cartoon world and unlock new skills and accessories.

name: Ragamuffins: Feline Fencers
description: Unique item shop meets card battle game...with cats...with hats

name: Reality Layer Zero
description: Let us begin the persuasion. Alas, mankind may forever live in absence of the truth. Verily, the resonant threads that extend across the many worlds spawn countless interpretations. Can insight be gleaned from the coalescing dimensions? It may yet all be for nothing. The meaning is up to you.

name: Muv-Luv Alternative Total Eclipse Remastered
description: As mankind races to create new weapons to turn the tide in its war against alien invaders, Yuuya, a hot-headed American pilot, is assigned to work with a beautiful but cold Japanese officer on a top-secret project. Can they learn to work together in time to make the weapon that saves us all?

name: Alien Time
description: Alien Time - Tower Defense game in which the player sets up defensive towers to repel waves of opponents that get stronger each time and force the player to use new options for defensive placement tactics.

name: Meet Cute: Beach
description: Is where anything better than summer vacation? Yes! A summer vacation with a hot girl! Grab your sunscreen, sunglasses, and get ready to have fun with her.

name: Odd One Out
description: Find the symbol that is different from the others, in progressively harder puzzles.

name: Feartress
description: Feartress is an incremental fantasy RPG where you gather resources, build structures and hire workers and armies to help you succeed in battle and take over multiple dimensions.

name: Journey to the Pumpkin Planet
description: A turn-based strategy game about managing the first human colony on the pumpkin planet.

name: Spirit Below the Waves
description: Explore, Survive the deep ocean a beautiful new world awaits. Unravel an amazing story about the player at your hand. Experience a roller coaster of emotions in this new unexplored world.

name: Bombs Away
description: Are you mentally prepared for bombs away? Choose one of 8 different styles of tanks to battle your friends from invisibility to flame throwing tanks. You'll need quick reflexes and some carefully planned strategy to be successful in battle. Good luck, and see in you in Bombs Away!

name: Charlie and Friends
description: Welcome to the world of Charlie and Friends! Currently looking for a new caretaker for our beloved characters: Charlie the Cat, Hilda the Hyena, Sammy the Snake, and Rosy the Rabbit.

name: Cozy Time
description: Cozy Time provides you with a cozy environment to focus, relax or rest without being disturbed.

name: By the Vine
description: By the Vine is a Christian-based Visual Novel. The story follows a young adult named Calum, who has to live on his best friend's farm after burning down his house. What hijinks will ensue as Calum adjust to his new life on the farm?

name: High Tech Low Life
description: High Tech Low Life is a third-person action-adventure game, set in a world inspired by 1980s/90s Cyberpunk Japanese Manga. Explore districts, with branched dialogue choice, walk and talk, shoot and talk, active reload, slow time and engage in third person firefights with challenging enemies.

name: Bomjtown
description: The game is a novel in a remote Soviet village. The game is packed with humor, so you will have fun playing it. It is important to carefully read the dialogues to choose the correct answer, there may be several of them. To select the answer, control the arrows and press enter.

name: Caddywack
description: In caddywack, you race against the clock to whack a ball into the goal with your car; in this physics-based car puzzle game, you play through 18 different levels, each with its unique set of challenges.

name: Winter Things
description: Winter Things is a 3D "find and click" puzzle game in which you have to find some items on the winter town location within a certain time. Only the most curious, patient and sharp-sighted will be able to finish this game!

name: Timewell: The Trail of Celestes
description: The search for survival leads to a new discovery: An alien signal of a mysterious origin. Humanity’s last hope rests on the shoulders of AI, SAT-V - designed for interstellar travel. Guide SAT-V through a perilous journey where she may be the salvation of humanity or their unspeakable destruction.

name: Skeletons
description: Regurgitated back into a cursed and dying world, you must fight and explore to ascend the tower. But be warned, time and life isn't on your side.

name: Dash Rider
description: Dashrider is a fast-paced 2D shooter game, in which you fight your way through countless waves of enemies to earn coins. Purchase new skills or stunning boss battles. Defeat the three guards to face the final boss and complete the game.

name: Game of the Dead
description: Gun down large hordes of Zombies and try to survive the night! Game Of The Dead is a casual Post-Apocalyptic Horror game with rogue-lite elements. You can build card decks that will allow you to quickly overcome the odds and help you fight against the thousands of Zombies that get in your way.

name: Kings & Cities
description: Kings & Cities is a turn-based strategy game in which you rule a province on a new continent: Epeiros. War and diplomacy will be required to establish your domination over these new lands.

name: My Neko Waifu!
description: A puzzle with anime girls on the beach. You can get to know each kitty better by passing exciting levels.

name: Dreadful River
description: The realm is under attack. The king and his most loyal guards are trying to save the Eternal Crown. Floating down a vast river on a simple raft, you have to fight enemies, improve your gear, find allies and explore mysteries along the shores. Can you turn the tide?

name: Gorgon's quest
description: Gorgon's quest is a single screen action/platformer. Play alone or with a friend (local co-op) as the mythical gorgon sisters use your petrifying gaze to turn your enemies into stone. Explore ancient greek, find power ups and defeat great bosses.

name: Heaven Work
description: Heaven Work - A clicker game where you have to defeat the demons in time, who are trying to get under the guise of angels to where the gates are closed for them. Click on the demons in time and get points, the more demons were not allowed into the sky, the more points you will get!

name: Antrio
description: Antrio is a 2D action-platformer inspired by classic games from the 8 bit era. Shoot, drill, climb and fly to fight lots of enemies and overcome the challenges each level has to offer.

name: Grand Arms: March of the Red Dragon
description: Squad-based strategy RPG with auto turn-based combat and real-time map movement. Build your army, defend your territory, and lead the armies of Prince Llewelyn to reconquer the scattered kingdoms of Wales from the English invaders.

name: Oh Sheep!
description: Oh sheep! is a fast paced arcade game where you gather and protect sheeps from monstrous creatures for the highest score!

name: Telos Pragmaton
description: Trapped in a small house with a deadly monster, use your wits and a mysterious device to survive in this fixed perspective survival horror. Keep the junctions charged so that you don't suffocate, but tread carefully as the monster will lurk in the shadows to hunt you, becoming ever more aggressive.

name: Salamander County Public Television
description: Become a professional thing-doer! Complete wacky assignments for Salamander County's local TV station, and solve the mystery of why nearly everyone in the county suddenly disappeared.

name: Corpus Edax
description: Corpus Edax is a first-person-melee RPG enveloped in an immersive-sim design philosophy. Set in newly built city on a distant planet, create your character and make your own choices in a reactive world - fight, talk or sneak your way out of confrontation. Your decision, is the right decision.

name: Hidden Objects with Edgar Allan Poe
description: Plunge into the mystical atmosphere of Edgar Allan Poe’s famous story! Feel like a detective unexpectedly caught up in the most mysterious and unusual investigation! The newest hidden object game with a storyline

name: Train Simulator: ÖBB 1063 Loco
description: Experience a complex classic on Austrian rails with RSSLO’s authentic ÖBB 1063 for Train Simulator!

name: Zodiac Fantasy
description: This is a horizontal board jumping game. The player needs to control the character to jump and climb in the scene. The ultimate goal of the player is to reach the end point as much as possible.

name: Box to the Beat VR
description: Box to the Beat is a fast and rhythmic boxing game that is focused around Indie artists of all genres

name: Asteroid
description: Asteroid is an open world action adventure RPG set in space! Explore the universe to save planets, upgrade your ship and equipment, and defeat increasingly fearsome enemies!

name: Mystwood Manor
description: Mystwood Manor is an adult game, in which you play a young man who is in charge of running a hotel full of beautiful women. Experience hours of exciting content, in this adult hotel management game, filled with steamy sex scenes, amusing dialogs and some very unexpected plot twists.

name: Bloodstage: Possessed by a Tsundere Demon
description: An unknown life form controls the crowds of mutated employees of the space station. Impress the demon girl by destroying thousands of possessed with dozens of weapons.

name: Victory 7
description: "Victory 7" is a roguelike-style game with the theme of slot x deck build.

name: Hermea
description: Hermea is an intern at Hermes' Delivery Service who transports mail by traversing perilous environments on foot and using a variety of abilities. Control Hermea to race against the clock and deliver timely as a faster time will reward a better score in this third person speedrunning platformer!

name: EarthRoyale
description: EarthRoyale is a Map simulation Observer game where the game each turn chooses one of many events to edit the world map

name: The Forest of Love
description: A top-down NSFW Furry Adventure game! Meet the neighbors, explore the forest, and unravel the mysteries within! Find out firsthand why it's called "The Forest of Love" with a charming group of raunchy critters!

name: En-Eins Perfektewelt Anastasis
description:
This expanded version has several improvements such as:
・ New character, new stage, new BGM added
・ Training mode added
・ Renewal of main character illustrations, UI, etc.
・ Addition and correction of story
・ Balance adjustment, defect correction

name: Birb Race
description: Race to be the fastest Birb in the world! Train your walking, climbing, gliding and swimming in 4 training games to improve yourself in the racing arena! Earn seeds to buy upgrades and unlock trophies to show off your skill!

name: Phobos Project
description: Phobos Project is a first-person psychological horror adventure exploring the depths of psychological horror. In this experiment you have to find a way out and keep your sanity level up through different hostile environments. Face your dread and try to find the source of the nightmare!

name: Way to the Cake
description: In the game you have to face difficult obstacles. Go through all the difficult places and test yourself for strength. Finally, a delicious cake awaits you ...

name: Monsters Versus Pals
description: Huge AI Tug Of War Battles Influenced By Powerful Player Heroes

name: Mist Monkey: Wanderer
description: From the mind of award-winning visual artist, Xander Clinthorne, comes a meditative indie-game about wandering and taking it slow. This title takes you deep into a beautiful pixel-art world with flow state inducing gameplay, The Great Monkey's wisdom to discover and a stunning original soundtrack.

name: Food Factory
description: Food Factory is game where players can produce food using various machines starting from gathering base products.

name: Sail
description: Open World VR Pirate Adventure Game!

name: Idol Hands 2
description: You, who have a discerning eye, found two luminous rough stones . One is Song Yunzhen, a beauty, In addition to the super high value of classical beauty, she is also a creative talent. The other is the exact opposite, a hot Taiwanese girl Rainie with dyed blond hair and trendy clothes.

name: Midnight Zone
description: Dodge, Dash, and fall through platforms to avoid death. This Hyper casual platformer is great to play if you're bored at the office or you're waiting for a multiplayer queue and have nothing else to do!

name: That Stupid Game
description: A not-so-serious online multiplayer game with 1st and 3rd person mechanics set in the classic Bomberman style. Bombs, rocket launchers, jetpacks, CTF, crazy rhythmic elements and much more. Includes 3 competitive games modes and a level editor for infinite replayability.

name: Battle of Tanks
description: Don't let the army of enemy tanks reach the southern border of the battlefield. You have several guns at your disposal and the ability to call an airstrike. Move around the battlefield in the top view and choose the right guns to attack. You need to hold out for the allotted time.

name: Fish Cymophis
description: A fishing horror game where you explore the many fishing locations of Cradle Lake. Fish in its cavernous depths and discover what lies within...

name: Kiwi Clicker
description: Deliver more and more kiwis to satiate the kings' hunger - sacrifice their pulp and transcend beyond your fruital form!

name: Vulgaria
description: Action, adventure, top down, rogue shooter, puzzle, RPG pick ups, randomly generated rooms, pick ups and levels. Fight your way down the dungeon with your shadow at your side picking up treasures, finding and solving puzzles. Discover why you have a missing face, and how your shadow is alive?!

name: Hoverboy
description: Explore different worlds and interact with the environment to the sound of a musical playlist showcasing music from Jesse Aidyn, Multi-Memory Controller, and Ginger Breaker.
Detective visual novel about mysteries of rural Russian town in 90-s, anime style.

name: Cryptid Coffeehouse
description: everyone's heard of mothman– the moth creature that haunts the outskirts of point pleasant, west virginia– but no one's heard of it like this! in some random idyllic midwestern town, you meet artemis (aka mothman) at your favorite coffee shop and begin an agonizingly slow burn romance with them.

name: Gor3
description: A mysterious castle and a mysterious artifact.

name: Vacation Adventures: Cruise Director 7
description: A great hidden object game set aboard a cruise ship

name: Sexy Gym
description: I love going to the gym! Guide Morris through his training at this unique gym as he gets intimate with his trainer! Fix your diet, get familiar with the equipment, boost your stamina, and hone your focus to see your trainer in glorious Live2D action!
